thread.section_title: Distrikt Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A nice stay
thread.title_full: A nice stay - Review of Distrikt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Amy11278
title: A nice stay
text: For the price this Times Square hotel can not be beat. All employees were very helpful. Checking in and out were a breeze. The elevator service was the only drawback as it usually took a bit to get on due to the number of elevators serving the hotel but once on you went quickly. I appreciated the security of the elevator as well since you had to have a keycard. Floors were quiet. The rooms were modern and nice. The size of the room was medium which is subjective I know. For reference, I've stayed in NYC hotels where the wall was next to the bed and ones where you had quiet a bit of room to spread out. This was somewhere in between. A couple would have room. A family will find the room a bit tight but manageable. (We stayed in a double.) Location was fantastic for theater, Times Square, and access to the subway. The bar downstairs, was a cool little place for breakfast and more. Would definitely consider again for return trips.
